column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////After one slice of Lou's
column2: I convinced myself that I need to move to this city. Being a Californian with all our vegan/hipster/gluten free/ extremely health conscious thin crust pizza I had no idea what was waiting for me at Lou's. Can't wait to go back and dive into the best deep dish pizza ever. If you're visiting the city
column3: I'd call in the order and if there's only two of you get the small. The medium was just too big for us.
